Package org.mini2Dx.core.game

Class Summary
BasicGame A simplified GameContainer for beginners to build upon
GameContainer Base class for mini2Dx game containers.
Mini2DxGame An implementation of Game for launching mini2Dx games
ScreenBasedGame An implementation of GameContainer that allows for separation of a game into multiple GameScreens and provides support for Transitions between such screens via a ScreenManager
